title: Equip 2020
article:
A choice of 8 different Equip groups on Mondays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays. 

Sign up now to guarantee your place!

* Talking Jesus
* Days of Wonder: Living a Supernatural Life
* The Marriage Course
* Meeting with God through the Bible
* Keys to Freedom
* Mission and Me
* Parenting for Faith
* Through the Bible



Head to ChurchSuite for more details or contact the Gateway Office.
